name: plaid toque
notes:
cute plaid toque knits up quickly with any dk weight yarn! 
three sizes to fit the whole family.

estelle double knit (c1): black, q65505
estelle double knit (c2): white, q65501

gauge: 30 sts by 27 rows equal 4” by 4” in 2 x 2 rib
with smaller needles after blocking 

needles: 4 mm (us 6) 16” circular needles, 4.5 mm
(us 7) 16” circular needles, 4.5 mm (us 7) double
pointed needles; or size needed to obtain gauge

notions: stitch marker, darning needle, pom pom
(optional)

finished sizes (measurements taken unstretched):
baby/toddler: 8” tall, 13” circumference; youth/
ladies small: 9.25” tall, 14” circumference; ladies
large/men: 11” tall, 16” circumference
